mapper.select: SELECT RCBC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS BRANCH , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_TYPE_CODE) AS CAR_TYPE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_NAME_CODE) AS CAR_NAME , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_FUEL_CODE) AS CAR_FUEL , FN_COMM_NAME(COMPANY) AS COMPANY , DELIVERY_DATE , RENTAL_ABLE_STATUS , DEFAULT_COST FROM RENTAL_CAR_BRANCHES_CAR RCBC, RENTAL_CAR RC WHERE RCBC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = RC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{branchCode}
